channel.title: General Technology Hiromi Work Geek on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Technology Hiromi Work Geek on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: work is fun
item.description: i enjoy work. it is fun. the people are nice. i am excited to get relaly involved and spend days and nights here. haha. i have a lot of monitor at my desk. a combined amount of 47inches. w00t. the best is the little 7” lilliput display. totally for irc and by irc i mean work. The office is real nice. it is real real open and everything is pretty cool.
